data.title: Train to and from Freiburg
data.meta_description: ✔ Train to and from Freiburg ✔ Secure online payment ✔ Free Wi-Fi and plug sockets on board ✔ 2 pieces of luggage
data.text:
Is free Wi-Fi available on trains to Freiburg?

Yes, passengers can access our free Wi-Fi while traveling to Freiburg.

How do I buy a train ticket to Freiburg?

Booking a train ticket to Freiburg with FlixTrain is simple and hassle-free. To purchase a ticket, select your departure and arrival cities and choose your preferred travel date in the search bar above. For the best deals, we recommend downloading the free FlixTrain App which allows you to have your ticket at your fingertips at all times.

How much does the train to Freiburg cost?

Travelling to Freiburg with FlixTrain can be super affordable! Depending on your departure location, you could pay as little as 1,49 € for your journey to Freiburg.

How do I use my FlixTrain ticket to Freiburg?

Getting to Freiburg with your FlixTrain ticket is easy! When you book your ticket online, we'll send you a PDF booking confirmation via email with a QR code that acts as your train ticket. And if you book through the FlixTrain App, your ticket will be automatically saved there for easy access.

Can I track my train from and to Freiburg?

You can easily track your FlixTrain using our Real-Time Train Tracker Tool. Enter your stop in Freiburg or booking number and check the status of your ride.

Can I reserve a seat on my train to Freiburg?

When you book your ticket to Freiburg with FlixTrain, a seat on board is always guaranteed and assigned to you for free.

How can I pay for my train ticket to Freiburg?

We provide multiple secure payment methods for purchasing your ticket, including card payments, Paypal, Google Pay, and more. When you reach the payment section, you can view all available options and select your preferred method. If you encounter any payment issues, please refer to our payment help page.

When is the cheapest time to book a train ticket to Freiburg?

To secure the best price for your FlixTrain journey to Freiburg, we recommend booking in advance. Tickets can be purchased for as little as 1,49 €. You can easily purchase your ticket on our website or through the app.

Can I take a bike on board FlixTrain to Freiburg?

You can bring your bike along with you on FlixTrain to Freiburg by reserving a bike slot during the booking process. Our coaches have bike racks available where you can securely store your bike during your trip. For more details, please refer to our bicycle transport page.

How much luggage can I carry on the train to Freiburg?

When you travel to Freiburg with FlixTrain, you don't have to worry about packing light. Your train ticket includes one carry-on bag and one checked bag. If you need to bring additional or special luggage, please check the available options on this page.

Are the trains to Freiburg equipped for passengers with reduced mobility?

We strive to make our trains as comfortable and accessible as possible for passengers with disabilities and limited mobility, including those who use wheelchairs, service animals, or are pregnant during their trip to Freiburg. We offer information and assistance to ensure that all passengers have a safe and pleasant journey. For more information on booking tickets with wheelchairs or walking aids, please visit this page.

Are trains to Freiburg wheelchair accessible?

Yes, all FlixTrain trains to Freiburg are wheelchair accessible, and we provide free transportation for wheelchairs, foldable wheelchairs, walking aids, and other assistive mobility devices.

Are service animals allowed on trains to Freiburg?

If you need to bring your guide dog on your trip to Freiburg, please book your ticket as usual and then contact our customer service no later than 36 hours prior to departure in order to add your guide dog to the booking free of charge.

What are the onboard services on trains to Freiburg?

You can travel to Freiburg in comfort with FlixTrain, as most of our trains offer amenities such as free Wi-Fi, guaranteed seating, private outlets, and restrooms.
